column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jesus - Thank you for your review and feedback. Can you tell me what was wrong with your order? We haven't changed any of our order processes
column3: we have had to serve the majority of our ramen via to-go orders. As a result
column4: eating ramen from a disposable container is not ideal
column5: but that is how we must handle business at the moment. However
column6: we did recently re-open our dining room partially in compliance with local laws. Any additional information you can provide will be greatly appreciated.
